column4: hello! I want to know what's all the differences between desktop and netbook editions. Do they get different default applications?
That is the difference.  The netbook edition has some software that runs instead of the typical desktop and panels.
but, aside interface, are there any changes? like pidgin instead of empathy or something like that? where can I read about that?
I don't know of any differences like that.  I don't know where you'd find that either.
